DIA_TaxCollector_HELLO_NS67A_03_01: Oh! I think I'm looking for you!

DIA_TaxCollector_HELLO_NS67B_03_08: That complicates things a bit. You owe...

DIA_TaxCollector_HELLO_NS67B_03_10: Hah, it's obvious! You have to pay...
DIA_TaxCollector_HELLO_NS67B_Nope_15_01: I don't carry that much with me.
DIA_TaxCollector_HELLO_NS67B_Nope_03_02: Nothing has happened. It's just that the next tax will be higher.
DIA_TaxCollector_HELLO_NS67B_Nope_03_03: I was expecting this. Well... another tax will hit your finances hard!
